title: Yarım Kalan Aşklar
overview: The Turkish TV series, Yarım Kalan Aşklar will show the incredible life story of a young boy named Ozan. He works as a journalist and he likes this field of activity. The young man has always taken a very responsible approach to the performance of his professional duties and sought to develop on the career ladder. A young and rather charming journalist named elif works with him. Ozan has been in love with her for a long time, but he could not summon the courage to take an important step in his life. Now Ozan began to understand that he can no longer delay and decides to make a marriage proposal to his beloved.Only no one could have foreseen that fate had prepared a great test for the couple in love. Ozan is involved in a terrible car accident and dies as a result of his injuries. In fact, this accident was not an accident and it was specially arranged for the main character. Fate was kind to Ozan and He gets another chance at life, but at the same time his soul moves into a completely different body. Ozan's memories are fully preserved, and when He learned that his death was faked, he decided not to let the situation take its course.The guy decides to personally find the attacker who is to blame for his death and he will do everything to ensure that he suffered the deserved punishment. He will also try to convince elif that he is the man she loved and was going to marry him. But can elif believe this and feel that in the body of another person is actually the soul of her favorite guy?
